item.title: About Author
item.description: I like to work at the intersection of Security and Automation. I enjoy building content and training. The blog is a work in progress - trying to get the pipeline working well. Expect some oddities (missing images, notes in posts). Seeking Opportunities I’m currently looking for new opportunities in Cyber Security (or adjacent fields). Check out my LinkedIn for more details (CV Page coming soon).
